gameDetails.name: Star Fleet Battles: Captain's Edition Basic Set
gameDetails.description:
The lead product of Star Fleet Battles Captain's Edition.  This is the fourth edition in the Star Fleet Battles series, and it is the current edition.

There have been two major reprintings of the rules, each of which incorporates some errata and cleanup in the rules in 1999 and 2005. These can be identified by a year printed on the lower part of the front cover.

Re-implements:

     Star Fleet Battles
     Star Fleet Battles Designer's Edition
     Star Fleet Battles Commander's Edition
